price: E, louvor a Allah, O Senhor dos céus e O Senhor da terra, O Senhor dos mundos.
arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falillahi al-ḥamdu rabbi al-samāwāti warabbi al-arḍi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
